Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Plasma Cannister
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Cannisters of bio-synthetic plasma. These can melt the flesh of your bones.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Gauss Cartridge
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Cartridges of magneticly charged alloy that supercharges into a crushing impact. Get Rekt.
